cast.overview: The invasion of a village in Byelorussia by German forces sends young Florya into the forest to join the weary Resistance fighters, against his family's wishes. There he meets a girl, Glasha, who accompanies him back to his village. On returning home, Florya finds his family and fellow peasants massacred. His continued survival amidst the brutal debris of war becomes increasingly nightmarish, a battle between despair and hope.
cast.title: Come and See

details.biography:
Viktors Lorencs (July 30, 1927 Riga – January 26, 1992 Riga) was a Latvian actor and screenwriter.

He played the main role in the movie "The Red Violin" and was the screenwriter of the movie "Madness".
details.name: Viktors Lorencs
